lines.text: Interested in the scenery?
You always do what you want, don't you?
I always know what I want - and usually get it.
If you've nothing better to do, a few of us are going to spend the weekend on our yacht.
Well, thanks, but - I'm all dated up for the weekend.
Well, if you should change your mind, we'll be glad to have you.
I'll smartin' him up - Stevie.
Will you please stop calling me Stevie! I'm your father.
Well, don't blame me.
I'm going abroad Tuesday - to be gone a year. Do you want to stay down here with me tomorrow?
Well, I don't think I'd better.
Afraid of me?
No! - Do you do this often?
Maybe.
I suppose you don't want to go back West with any cold and lovely heiress complex to come between you and your corn-fed girls.
Your he-man, son-of-the-West novelty stuff is a bit tricky. Nope. I don't think I'd care for it.
My, but it's chilly.
Well, it you'd pull that what's-it's around you, a little closer.
Oh, Miss Corning, I'd like to thank you for the weekend.
Oh, no, not at all. On the whole, I think I should thank you - for not making love to me.
Why, I never thought of such a thing.
You wouldn't, my dear. Well - this is goodbye. Goodbye from the cold and lovely heiress.
[Grabs Hawks and gives him a big kiss]
Honor? What has honor to do with it? This is Wall Street! We fight for an existence here. I'm afraid you haven't the stuff in you to make good. It takes nerve!
You've no right to think! You're paid to sell our stock. When you don't sell it, we don't pay you. Understand?
Will you have cream or lemon?
Nothing, thanks. I'll have a cigarette, if you don't mind.
My, but the city has changed you.
You know, I've been meaning to get a hold of you for ever so long.
Really? Well, you're just in time. I'm leaving town tomorrow.
Vacation?
Quite a long one - I've been fired.
My dear boy, Wall Street isn't a football field.
And to think, I wasted a perfectly good kiss on you.
If you butt into our game on your own, you're liable to be snuffin' a lily, get me?

[Drunkenly after being chased by two girls]
Oh, I wish they'd add a nineteenth amendment, makng it closed season on manhunting!
Keep your paws off me, Fish Face!
What a he-man you turned out to be.

Look out for this Fish Face, he's no sucker! If he pulls anything or gets you in a jam, you gotta out smart him. Make love to him! Let him think you're crazy about him. He'll be easy for you after that.
I gotcha.
You know, bein' a dead moll ain't gonna help Slim none.
Oh, don't cry Peaches, it'll spoil your looks. And that dumb egg ain't worth it.
Oh, I'm crazy about you lovely.
And I'm nuts over you white man!

[after kissing Sophie]
You better move fast, Pepper Mama. Or I won't let ya get outta that door.
You dirty rat!
Tell that charming daughter of yours, that three Presidents were born in my State. That proves they're not all yaps where I come from.
